title: Yakitate Japan
alternative_title: Yakitate!! Japan, 焼きたて!! ジャぱん
description: Azuma Kazuma isn’t terribly clever, but he’s got a good heart and great skill – at baking. Since childhood, he’s been on a quest to create the perfect bread to represent Japan internationally. Now, he seeks to enter the famous bakery Pantasia, in hopes of reaching his goal. But plots abound…
